title: The Suma Oriental of Tomé Pires
subtitle: An Account of the East, from the Red Sea to Japan
author: Tomé Pires
description: A critical English edition of Tomé Pires' Suma Oriental, written in Malacca and India between 1512–1515, together with The Book of Francisco Rodrigues, containing a rutter of voyages in the Red Sea, nautical rules, almanack, and maps. The work documents early Portuguese knowledge of the East from the Red Sea to Japan.
